mapper.sql: id, status, project_id, current_period, amount, should_receive_time, receive_time, total_amount, left_period, left_amount, total_period, order_id

mapper.update:
update t_gcgl_project_payment_receive
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_period = #{currentPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
should_receive_time = #{shouldReceiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
left_period = #{leftPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
left_amount = #{leftAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
total_period = #{totalPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_gcgl_project_payment_receive set status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_period = #{currentPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, should_receive_time = #{shouldReceiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, left_period = #{leftPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, left_amount = #{leftAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_period = #{totalPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.status, a.project_id, current_period, amount, should_receive_time, receive_time, total_amount, left_period, left_amount, total_period, order_id from t_gcgl_project_payment_receive a,t_gcgl_project p where a.project_id = p.project_id and a.status='OK#' and p.object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1

select a.id, a.status, a.project_id, current_period, amount, should_receive_time, receive_time, total_amount, left_period, left_amount, total_period, order_id from t_gcgl_project_payment_receive a,t_gcgl_project p where a.project_id = p.project_id and p. object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.status='OK#'

select IFNULL(sum(abs(`amount`)),0) receivedAmount from t_gcgl_project_payment_Receive a,t_gcgl_project p where a.project_id = p.project_id and p. object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.status='OK#'
